metadata.title: Economic Assembly of Uzbekistan | Unified Ecosystem for Entrepreneurs
metadata.description: Economic Assembly of Uzbekistan — uniting 46+ industry associations, 8 strategic service directions and managing $20B+ investment projects.
metadata.author: Economic Assembly of Uzbekistan

hero.badge: First time in Uzbekistan in a new format
hero.headline: Unified Ecosystem
hero.subheadlineHighlight: All your business needs — in one place.

about.headline: Center of Uzbekistan
about.description1: The Assembly of Economy of the Republic of Uzbekistan is the country's largest non-governmental non-profit organization, bringing together more than 46 industry associations.
about.description2: We create an effective dialogue between the state and business, facilitate the attraction of international investments, and ensure the protection of entrepreneurs' interests.
features: Direct and constructive dialogue with government authorities

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To make Uzbekistan's entrepreneurship competitive in the international arena and to make a sustainable contribution to the country's economic growth.

goal.title: Our Goal
goal.text: By 2030, to establish Uzbekistan as the leading business hub of Central Asia.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: Transparency, innovative thinking, partnership, and protection of national interests.

services.headline: Service
services.description: All the services you need to grow your business — in one place

smartCity.description: Uzbekistan's largest smart city project on 6,400 hectares. Modern infrastructure and green technologies.

contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, contact us

items.question: How can I become a member of the Assembly?
items.answer: Fill out an application or contact us. The process is simple and fast.

items.question: What is the membership fee?
items.answer: Membership fee depends on the company size. Contact us for detailed information.

items.question: What services are provided?
items.answer: We provide services in 8 strategic directions: Smart City, GR, FR, BR, Invest Hub, and others.

items.question: What are the office working hours?
items.answer: We work Monday to Saturday from 09:00 to 18:00.

footer.tagline: Help to entrepreneurs // Help to the Motherland

legal.copyright: Economic Assembly of Uzbekistan. All rights reserved.

aboutPage.headline: Uniting citizens, business and
aboutPage.description: We unite citizens, the business community, and the state in the shared pursuit of building a strong and competitive economy. The Economic Assembly of Uzbekistan is a non-governmental non-profit organization dedicated to fostering entrepreneurship, supporting the private sector, and cultivating a favorable investment environment across the nation.

chairman.quote: Our vision is to shape a better future for everyone. We strive to foster strong and trust-based relationships between the people of Uzbekistan, business leaders, the state, and the international community, uniting our efforts for the sake of sustainable development and global cooperation.

gr.title: Interaction with Government Authorities
gr.subtitle: Government Relations
gr.description: The Assembly of Economy of the Republic of Uzbekistan ensures direct communication with key government entities, including the Administration of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan, the Cabinet of Ministers, the Senate of the Oliy Majlis, and relevant line ministries.

fr.title: Business Diplomacy
fr.subtitle: Business Diplomacy
fr.description: Developing international relations with foreign organizations, establishing partnerships, and organizing business delegation exchanges.

local.title: Strengthening Ties with Local Entrepreneurs
local.subtitle: Local Business
local.description: The Assembly of Economy brings together more than 46 industry associations, creating a robust platform for harmonious and mutually beneficial cooperation.

ppp.title: Public-Private Partnership
ppp.subtitle: PPP
ppp.description: We promote effective interaction between the state and business, providing entrepreneurs with expert support and the conditions necessary for creating sustainable projects.

mission.title: Trusted partner
mission.description:
We are committed to supporting businesses of all sizes and fostering sustainable economic growth in the Republic of Uzbekistan.
Key Areas of Our Activity:
points: Participating in the development and improvement of legislative reforms

team.headline: Our
team.description: A team of professionals united by a common mission — to create opportunities, strengthen businesses, and shape the future of entrepreneurship in Uzbekistan.

aliyev.role: Deputy Chairman for Security and Legal Support
aliyev.roleEn: Deputy Chairman for Security and Legal Support

ruziyeva.role: Press Secretary - Deputy Chairperson for Information Policy
ruziyeva.roleEn: Press Secretary - Deputy Chairperson for Information Policy

mirzarakhmatov.roleEn: Head of Department for work with State Agencies

ahmadova.roleEn: Assistant to the Chairperson for Youth Affairs

timeline.headline: Path of
timeline.description: Since 2021, we have been consistently and confidently shaping a modern, open, and sustainable business environment in Uzbekistan.

2021.title: Foundation
2021.event: The Economic Assembly of Uzbekistan is officially registered by the Ministry of Justice
2021.details: It operates as a non-governmental non-profit organization (NGO)

2022.title: Membership Expansion
2022.event: The Assembly has brought together over 100 member companies
2022.details: Established strategic partnerships with leading enterprises and entrepreneurs

2023.title: Association Union
2023.event: The Assembly has brought together 46 industry associations
2023.details: Ensured the integration of business unions across various sectors and regions of the country

2024.title: International Cooperation
2024.details: Developing strategic partnerships with international innovative projects and foreign investors

cta.headline: Join
cta.description: Join the Economic Assembly of Uzbekistan and gain exclusive access to a robust business community that unites 46 industry associations and over 100 of the nation's leading entrepreneurs and corporations.

hero.headline: Strategic
hero.description: A multifunctional platform that unites businesses, ensures the protection of entrepreneurs' interests, and creates opportunities for local companies to expand onto the global stage.

investHub.title: Investment & Infrastructure
investHub.subtitle: Invest Hub & Smart City
investHub.description: Access to major investment opportunities and modern industrial infrastructure. Operating in world-class industrial zones within the "Central Asia Smart City" mega-project ($20B).

governmentRelations.description: A bridge between the private sector and government. Constructive dialogue for eliminating bureaucratic barriers and solving legislative issues.

hero.headline: Major
hero.description: The strategic projects of the Economic Assembly of Uzbekistan represent some of the most attractive investment opportunities in the region.

tramway.title: Tashkent Tramway
tramway.description: Modern tram system for Tashkent city. 56 km of lines and 60 modern trams.
tramway.fullDescription: A major infrastructure project aimed at developing public transport in Tashkent. The project involves construction of 56 km of tram lines, procurement of 60 modern trams, and building passenger infrastructure. The project will improve transport accessibility and reduce environmental pollution.

ringRoad.title: Tashkent Ring Road
ringRoad.description: Construction of a ring road around Tashkent. 6-lane highway and modern infrastructure.
ringRoad.fullDescription: Construction of a 160 km long 6-lane ring road around Tashkent city. The project will significantly reduce traffic congestion in the city center, improve transport logistics, and serve as an important corridor for regional trade.

smartCity.title: Central Asia Smart City
smartCity.description: The largest and most high-tech 'smart city' in Central Asia is being developed in the Ohangaron district.
smartCity.fullDescription: The most advanced smart city in Central Asia, being developed on a 6,400-hectare site in the Ohangaron district. The project envisions the creation of world-class industrial zones, modern residential quarters, commercial centers, and green public spaces. The city will be equipped with 5G infrastructure, intelligent management systems, and green energy technologies.

industrialPark.title: Ohangaron Industrial Park
industrialPark.description: Modern industrial zone with ready infrastructure for manufacturing enterprises.
industrialPark.fullDescription: A modern industrial park with ready infrastructure for manufacturing enterprises, located in Ohangaron district. The project offers tax benefits, ready logistics infrastructure, and cheap energy for investors.

stateHospital.title: Multi-Profile State Hospital
stateHospital.description: Modern 1,000-bed multi-profile hospital. World-class medical equipment.
stateHospital.fullDescription: Construction of a modern 1,000-bed multi-profile hospital equipped with world-class medical equipment. The project aims to improve the quality of medical services for the population of Tashkent and surrounding regions.

privateClinic.title: International Private Clinic
privateClinic.description: Premium-class private clinic with international standards.
privateClinic.fullDescription: Construction of an international standard private clinic in Tashkent offering premium medical services. The clinic will be equipped with the latest diagnostic and treatment equipment and staffed with qualified international doctors.

solarEnergy.title: Solar Power Plant
solarEnergy.description: 200 MW capacity solar power plant. Green and renewable energy.
solarEnergy.fullDescription: Construction of a 200 MW capacity solar power plant. The project contributes to improving the country's energy independence and increasing the share of renewable energy. Modern solar panels and energy storage systems will be used.

eduJob.title: Edu-Job Training Center
eduJob.description: Large-scale center for training and employing young people. Modern professions.
eduJob.fullDescription: A large-scale educational center for training young people in modern professions and employment. The center offers courses in IT, digital marketing, business management and other in-demand professions, providing direct connections with employers.

kidsTime.title: Kids Time Educational Center
kidsTime.description: Modern educational center for children. Creative and intellectual development.
kidsTime.fullDescription: A modern educational center for children's creative and intellectual development. The center offers courses in foreign languages, programming, music, art and other directions. Modern teaching methods and an experienced team of educators.

partners.headline: Project
partners.description: We implement projects in partnership with government entities, international financial institutions, and leading private corporations.

cta.headline: Join
cta.description: Contact us to become a part of our strategic projects and discover new investment opportunities.
cta.interestedDescription: Contact us for more information about investment opportunities and partnership.

common.notFoundDescription: The project you are looking for does not exist.

hero.headline: News and
hero.description: Latest updates on the Economy of the Assembly of the Republic of Uzbekistan's activities, ongoing projects, international cooperation, and the overall evolution of the business ecosystem

newsletter.headline: Stay
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our weekly newsletter for the latest news on economic development, investment opportunities, and Assembly initiatives.
newsletter.privacyNote: By clicking "Subscribe" you agree to our privacy policy.

success.title: Successfully subscribed!
success.description: You will receive your first newsletter soon.

smartCityInvestment.title: $5 Billion New Investment Attracted for Smart City Project
smartCityInvestment.excerpt: International consortium announces significant financing milestone for Central Asia's largest urban development project — a key step in Uzbekistan's economic modernization.
smartCityInvestment.content: A group of international investors has signed an agreement to invest $5 billion in Uzbekistan's flagship Smart City project. This financing covers the project's second phase and will be implemented by 2030.
smartCityInvestment.author: Assembly Press

economicForum.title: 2025 Central Asia Economic Forum Successfully Concluded
economicForum.excerpt: Leaders from 15 countries gathered in Tashkent for a three-day summit on regional economic integration. Over 50 memorandums were signed during the forum.
economicForum.content: The Central Asia Economic Forum held in Tashkent has concluded successfully. The event was attended by 500+ delegates from 15 countries and over 50 cooperation memorandums were signed.
economicForum.author: Assembly Press

euTradeAgreement.title: New Trade Agreement Signed with the European Union
euTradeAgreement.excerpt: Uzbekistan signed comprehensive trade partnership with the EU, significantly reducing tariffs in key export sectors.
euTradeAgreement.content: A new trade agreement has been signed between Uzbekistan and the European Union. The agreement reduces tariffs for textiles, agriculture, and industrial products.
euTradeAgreement.author: Assembly Press

textileExport.title: Textile Association Records Record Export Growth
textileExport.excerpt: Member association celebrates 40% year-on-year growth in textile and apparel exports.
textileExport.content: The Uzbekistan Textile Industry Association achieved record results in 2024. Export volume increased by 40% and reached $3.5 billion.
textileExport.author: Assembly Press

skillsDevelopment.title: National Skills Development Initiative Launched
skillsDevelopment.excerpt: Assembly signs comprehensive workforce development agreement with Ministry of Education.
skillsDevelopment.content: Under the new national skills development initiative, more than 100,000 specialists will be trained. The program covers IT, industry, and service sectors.
skillsDevelopment.author: Assembly Press

dubaiPartnership.title: Strategic Partnership with Dubai Chamber of Commerce
dubaiPartnership.excerpt: Memorandum signed with Dubai Chamber opens business opportunities for Uzbek companies in the UAE.
dubaiPartnership.content: A strategic partnership memorandum has been signed between the Economic Assembly of Uzbekistan and the Dubai Chamber of Commerce. This opens new markets for Uzbek companies.
dubaiPartnership.author: Assembly Press

industrialParkPhase.title: Industrial Park Project First Phase Completed
industrialParkPhase.excerpt: The industrial park in Chirchik district has started operations. First 10 resident companies launched.
industrialParkPhase.content: The first phase of the Chirchik industrial park has been successfully completed. 10 resident companies have started production and more than 2,000 jobs have been created.
industrialParkPhase.author: Assembly Press

membershipProgram.title: New Membership Program: Special Benefits for Small Business
membershipProgram.excerpt: Special preferential membership program announced for small and medium businesses. Annual fee reduced by 50%.
membershipProgram.content: The Assembly has introduced a new membership program for small and medium businesses. Under the program, membership fee has been reduced by 50% and additional services are provided.
membershipProgram.author: Assembly Press

tramwayConstruction.title: Tramway Project: Construction Works Started
tramwayConstruction.excerpt: Construction of the Tashkent tramway line has officially started. The first phase will be completed in 2026.
tramwayConstruction.content: Construction of the tramway line connecting Tashkent region with the city center has begun. The project is being financed by the Islamic Development Bank.
tramwayConstruction.author: Assembly Press

solarStation.title: Solar Power Station Launched
solarStation.excerpt: 100 MW solar power station launched in Tashkent region. Will produce energy for 50,000 homes annually.
solarStation.content: A new solar power station in Tashkent region has been successfully launched. The station has 100 MW capacity and will power more than 50,000 homes annually.
solarStation.author: Assembly Press

itParkResidents.title: IT Park Residents Reached 500
itParkResidents.excerpt: Uzbekistan IT Parks reached 500 residents. Sector exports totaled $500 million.
itParkResidents.content: The number of resident companies in Uzbekistan IT Parks has reached 500. Sector exports totaled $500 million and more than 15,000 developers are active.
itParkResidents.author: Assembly Press

investorsForum.title: International Investors Forum: Results and Agreements
investorsForum.excerpt: $2 billion worth of agreements signed at the international investors forum in Tashkent.
investorsForum.content: The international investors forum has concluded successfully. Agreements worth $2 billion were signed for 30 projects during the forum.
investorsForum.author: Assembly Press

agroCluster.title: Agro-Industrial Cluster Established
agroCluster.excerpt: New agro-industrial cluster established in Fergana Valley. The cluster unites 50 enterprises.
agroCluster.content: A new agro-industrial cluster has started operations in the Fergana Valley. The cluster unites 50 agricultural and processing enterprises.
agroCluster.author: Assembly Press

eduJobPlatform.title: EDU-JOB Platform: 10,000 Graduates
eduJobPlatform.excerpt: EDU-JOB education platform celebrated 10,000 graduates. 70% were employed.
eduJobPlatform.content: The EDU-JOB platform has reached 10,000 graduates. More than 70% of graduates have been employed.
eduJobPlatform.author: Assembly Press

turkeyPartnership.title: New Partnership Program with Turkey
turkeyPartnership.excerpt: New economic cooperation program signed between Uzbekistan and Turkey.
turkeyPartnership.content: A new economic cooperation program has been signed between Uzbekistan and Turkey. The program covers trade, investment, and tourism sectors.
turkeyPartnership.author: Assembly Press

taxBenefits.title: New Tax Benefits for Exporters
taxBenefits.excerpt: New tax benefits introduced for exporting companies. Profit tax reduced by 50%.
taxBenefits.content: The government has introduced new tax benefits for exporting enterprises. The profit tax rate has been reduced by 50%.
taxBenefits.author: Assembly Press

hero.headline: Contact
hero.description: Do you have any questions or proposals? Feel free to reach out — our team is always ready to assist you and respond to your inquiries.

form.headline: Send
form.privacyNote: By submitting, you agree to our privacy policy

success.title: Message sent!
success.description: We will contact you soon. Usually we respond within 24 hours.

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Become a member or learn about membership

social.title: Social Networks
social.description: Follow us on social media and stay updated with the latest news.

quickContact.title: Quick Contact
quickContact.description: Get a quick response via Telegram or call us.

howToJoin.question: How can I become a member of the Assembly?
howToJoin.answer: To become a member, fill out the online application or visit our office. We will contact you after reviewing your membership application.

membershipFee.question: What is the membership fee?
membershipFee.answer: The membership fee varies depending on the company size and selected plan. For detailed information, please contact us.

services.question: What services are provided?
services.answer: We provide GR (Government Relations), investment attraction, workforce training, international cooperation, and many other services.

officeHours.question: What are the office hours?
officeHours.answer: Our office is open Monday through Saturday from 09:00 to 18:00. Sunday is a day off.

cta.headline: Join the
cta.description: Develop your business with 46+ industry associations and take advantage of new opportunities.
